main.name: Sai Prashanthi V
main.bio: Hi there! I am Sai Krishna Varakala! I am a Computer Science graduate and an experienced Software Engineer. I am passionate about Full Stack applications. Software development has been my area of interest ever since I graduated from high school. I am passionate to solve challenging problems in the field of software engineering by deriving key insights about what the customer requirements are by adding new dimensions to my ability to think. My expertise lies in building highly secured enterprise class applications. I have previously served as Graduate Research Associate at Watson Institute for Systems Excellence (WISE). Prior to joining Binghamton University, I have worked at Infosys Limited as Systems Engineer. I am curious and committed to being a team player and contributing to the role in a dedicated and structured approach using my problem-solving skills.

education.school: Binghamton University - State University of New York

work.title: Student Assistant - Graduate Grader
work.description1: Assessed assignments for 150 graduate students across six distinct coursework modules, providing timely and actionable feedback to support academic excellence
work.description2: Guided students in debugging and error-checking their code, resulting in a 25% decrease in the number of coding errors made by students

work.title: Graduate Research Associate - Software Engineer
work.description1: Collaborative project of Innovation Associates(iA) and Watson Institute for Systems Excellence (WISE)
work.description2: Developed the machine emulator/digital twin application by collaborating with simulation team for NEXiA software testing
work.description3: Integrated station level and system level testing for small-scale and large-scale systems in machine emulator application and also enabled past performance tracking with historical data to analyze the system performance and triggered various error scenarios in the application
work.description4: Incorporated past performance tracking using historical data and simulated error scenarios to scrutinize system performance in the digital twin application

work.title: Systems Engineer - Software Development Engineer
work.description1: Excelled Infosys Foundation Program with an overall aggregate of 92% and worked as Java full stack web application developer in a Research & Development Project at Infosys Center for Emerging Technology Solutions (iCETS)
work.description2: Infosys Database Migration(iDM) Platform : Developed a web-based database migration tool for users to migrate databases from one source database to target database like Oracle, MS SQL Server to PostgreSQL
work.description3: Served as Automation Anchor for iDM
